description:
Without looking at the log files users cant really figure out what is going on when attaching/deleting/creating volumes fail. While running against euca2ools you very often get the following response back from the server:

chuck@homer:~/work/server/openstack/devstack/devstack$ euca-delete-volume vol-4
UnknownError: An unknown error has occurred. Please try your request again.
chuck@homer:~/work/server/openstack/devstack/devstack$
title: EC2 API hides exceptions from the user. (volumes)

comments.content: Without looking at the log files users cant really figure out what is going on when attaching/deleting/creating volumes fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
